input_text:
Job Title: Program Manager

Location: Boston, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Job#: 2024736

Job Description:

Apex Systems combines with parent company On Assignment to make it the 2nd largest IT staffing agency in the country.

Apex has an opportunity for a Program Manager role. This is a +6-month contract position, and the pay rate is negotiable depending on experience.

For applicants who are interested in the  Program Manager  opportunity; please send a Word resume to Liz Papell, Professional Recruiter, at  [email protected] 

 Position: Program Manager 

 Location: Remote - EST Hours (optional on-site location in Hingham, MA) 

 Rate: negotiable based on experience 

Duration: +6-month contract

Position Description:

 Looking for a senior resource to oversee and manage 3 projects (1 large, 2 smaller).  The project dates will overlap, and this person will need to manage more than one, simultaneously.  The projects involve engagement across multiple teams and third party vendors, so the ideal candidate would have this background as well.  The projects also involve a range of health-related aspects (prior authorizations, utilization management, claims, etc.).  There will not be individual Project Managers under them. They will be hands on - facilitating, meeting with the teams, and assisting in building user stories for all three projects over the course of their assignment. 

Required experience:

 Health insurance experience, or experience with health terminology, is preferred  Strong facilitation skills, have management of multiple large projects, can work collaboratively, and can be flexible in a hybrid environment (Agile & Waterfall.) They should have personal experience with both methodologies.  Ideal candidate would have experience with IT implementations, but they do not need to be extremely technical.  Need experience with MS Project, Jira, and PowerPoint. There will be business-side and enterprise technology BAs.  There is not a strict schedule while they are a contractor, but their team and project stakeholders are expected to be onsite about once a week, and their presence (even 1-2x/month) would add collaborative value.  The ideal candidate would be local and occasionally willing to commute to Hingham. 

 Additional Benefits: 

For this opportunity, you will also be eligible for benefits through Apex for the contract period, 401K, medical/health benefits options, a W2 hourly rate, weekly pay, and direct deposit!

EEO Employer

Apex will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. If you have visited our website in search of information on employment opportunities or to apply for a position, and you require an accommodation in using our website for a search or application, please contact our Employee Services Department at [email protected] or 844-463-6178.

When you join Apex, you become part of a team that values innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning. We offer quality career resources, training, certifications, development opportunities, and a comprehensive benefits package. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in many awards, including ClearlyRated's Best of Staffing速 in Talent Satisfaction in the United States and Great Place to Work速 in the United Kingdom and Mexico.
